11.ara-name: كتاب النكاح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Muhammad bin Ka'b narrated that:Ibn Abbas said: "Mut'ah was only during the beginning of Islam. A man would arrive in a land that he was not familiar with so he would marry a woman for the extent of time that he thought he would remain there. So his Mut'ah was upheld and his case was fine until the (following) Ayah was revealed: Except their wives or what their right hands possess. Then every private part other than those became unlawful

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي تَحْرِيمِ نِكَاحِ الْمُتْعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About (The Prohibition of) Mut'ah
